column1: Supplementary Table 1. Summary statistics and GenBank SRA accession numbers for assembled Illumina-based transcriptomes (40 taxa) and EST (1 taxon) and genomic gene sets (5 taxa) used in this study. GenBank SRA accession numbers in bold were generated for this study. Species in the SH-like analyses are indicated with an asterisk.
